verses.html:
1
Down at the cross where my Saviour died,
Down where for cleansing from sin I cried,
There to my heart was the blood applied;
Glory to His name.

verses.label: 1C
verses.html:
1
Glory to His name,
Glory to His name:
There to my heart was the blood applied;
Glory to His name.

2
I am so wondrously saved from sin,
Jesus so sweetly abides within;
There at the cross where He took me in;
Glory to His name.

verses.label: 2C
verses.html:
2
Glory to His name,
Glory to His name:
There to my heart was the blood applied;
Glory to His name.

3
Oh, precious fountain that saves from sin,
I am so glad I have entered in;
There Jesus saves me and keeps me clean;
Glory to His name.

verses.label: 3C
verses.html:
3
Glory to His name,
Glory to His name:
There to my heart was the blood applied;
Glory to His name.

4
Come to this fountain so rich and sweet;
Cast thy poor soul at the Saviourâ€™s feet;
Plunge in today, and be made complete;
Glory to His name.

verses.label: 4C
verses.html:
4
Glory to His name,
Glory to His name:
There to my heart was the blood applied;
Glory to His name.
